content:
luis Martinez Administration EditorFebruary  

Student Body President Reggie Thedford spoke about the dates for the upcoming spring executive elections during this weeks student government meeting PERIOD

The positions up for election include the student body president position executive vice president vice president of academic affairs and vice president of student affairs PERIOD

Thedford said during the meeting the applications for the election should be out by the end of the week PERIOD

Candidates will have until March  to turn in their applications PERIOD

For the packet you have to write a candidates platform and get a hundred signatures Thedford said PERIOD From when the packets are available to March  you have that whole time to complete the packet. the candidates will have  school days not including weekends or spring break to complete and turn in the packet PERIOD Orientations for the packets canidates will take place the day after applications are due PERIOD

Orientation is where theyll go over campaigning violations the rules such as you cant campaign here and you can tear someones poster down Thedford said PERIOD Theyll take their picture theyll make sure all their information is correct and things of that nature. the orientation as well the spring executive election will be run by the Elections Commission PERIOD

After orientation is completed the candidates will to campaign for two weeks and on March  there will be a debate with the candidates for the executive positions PERIOD

They dont have to campaign if they dont want to Thedford said. they have two weeks for campaigning and then campaign is done. voting will begin April  and end the following day PERIOD

On April  the unofficial results will be announced with the official results announced a week later on April  PERIOD

Executive Vice President Catie Witt said the next president of Eastern would be announced at the Board of Trustees meeting on March  PERIOD

The meeting will be open to the public and the next president will be at the meeting as well PERIOD

The Nearly Naked 5k run was rescheduled due to lack of registration for the event. the tentative date for the event is March  but a finalized date will be announced next week PERIOD

Luis Martinez can be reached at  or emailprotected PERIOD

My name is Luis Martinez and I am a senior journalism major PERIOD I am the currentNews editor for the Daily Eastern News. im a gamer bookworm and a.. PERIOD
